alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:23AM CDT until April 01 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Walker County in central Alabama... Winston County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 323 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sardis to Eldridge, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Arley, Double Springs, Addison, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Curry, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Nesmith, Ashbank, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Falls City, Moreland and Smith Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
